title: Strengthening curriculum development practical skills: Mathematical application competency for online-based dental education administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and dental care experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Apply basic statistical techniques for dental treatment data analysis to improve work efficiency by 20%.

Learners plan and evaluate a dental equipment operation budget (100 million KRW scale) using mathematical models (e.g., linear programming), achieving a budget deviation within ±5% and proposing a 15% improvement plan for resource utilization efficiency.
Spatial analysis techniques can be utilized to propose optimization strategies for dental clinic layouts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
